languages.text: "У меня есть предложение, которое всех устроит: я выясню, кто и зачем устроил этот переполох, а после мы вместе отправимся на Даргонус и предстанем перед маршалом".
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."
languages.original_text: "У меня есть предложение, которое всех устроит: я выясню, кто и зачем устроил этот переполох, а после мы вместе отправимся на Даргонус и предстанем перед маршалом".

traits.locale_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone. I will find out who has caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and come before the Marshal together."
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone. I will find out who has caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and come before the Marshal together."
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who has caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who has caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."
"I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

languages.text: «Tengo una propuesta que contentará a todo el mundo: descubriré quién ha causado esta conmoción y por qué, e iremos a Dargonus a ver al Mariscal todos juntos».
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo una propuesta que contentará a todo el mundo: descubriré quién ha causado esta conmoción y por qué, e iremos a Dargonus a ver al Mariscal todos juntos».

languages.text: “我有个提议，可以让我们双方都满意。我准备查清楚究竟是谁引发了这场骚乱，弄清楚这一切到底是怎么回事。之后，我们一起前往达戈努斯，亲自与元帅见面。”
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: “我有个提议，可以让我们双方都满意。我准备查清楚究竟是谁引发了这场骚乱，弄清楚这一切到底是怎么回事。之后，我们一起前往达戈努斯，亲自与元帅见面。”

languages.text: 「皆を満足させる提案がある。誰がこの混乱を引き起こし、なぜ起こったのかを明らかにしてから、ダルゴナスに向かい、一緒に将帥のところに行こう」
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: 「皆を満足させる提案がある。誰がこの混乱を引き起こし、なぜ起こったのかを明らかにしてから、ダルゴナスに向かい、一緒に将帥のところに行こう」

languages.text: « J'ai une proposition qui mettra tout le monde d'accord : dès que j'aurai découvert qui a provoqué ces troubles et pourquoi, nous nous rendrons à Dargonus et nous irons voir le maréchal ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une proposition qui mettra tout le monde d'accord : dès que j'aurai découvert qui a provoqué ces troubles et pourquoi, nous nous rendrons à Dargonus et nous irons voir le maréchal ensemble. »

languages.text: "Herkesi memnun edecek bir teklifim var: Kimin bu kargaşaya sebep olduğunu ve bunun nedenini bulayım, sonrasında da Dargonus'a gidip hep birlikte Miralay'ın huzuruna çıkalım."
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: "Herkesi memnun edecek bir teklifim var: Kimin bu kargaşaya sebep olduğunu ve bunun nedenini bulayım, sonrasında da Dargonus'a gidip hep birlikte Miralay'ın huzuruna çıkalım."

languages.text: "Ich habe einen für alle Beteiligten zufriedenstellenden Vorschlag: Ich werde herausfinden, was diesen Aufruhr ausgelöst hat, und dann fliegen wir nach Dargonus und sprechen gemeinsam mit dem Marschall."
languages.original_text: "I have a proposal that will satisfy everyone: I will find out who caused this commotion and why, and then we will travel to Dargonus and go before the Marshal together."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einen für alle Beteiligten zufriedenstellenden Vorschlag: Ich werde herausfinden, was diesen Aufruhr ausgelöst hat, und dann fliegen wir nach Dargonus und sprechen gemeinsam mit dem Marschall."
